mapper.select: select a.spaceId,a.upstreamId,a.dividedY,a.dividedZ,t.upstreamDivided from w_adspace a,w_upstream_type t, (select spaceId,upstreamId,startTime,IFNULL(endTime,now())as endTime from w_adspace_upstream where upstreamId = #{upstreamId}) au where TO_DAYS(#{date})>=TO_DAYS(au.startTime) and TO_DAYS(au.endTime)>TO_DAYS(#{date}) and au.spaceId = a.spaceId and a.upstreamType = t.upstreamType
select count(0) from w_statistics where TO_DAYS(createTime) = TO_DAYS(#{date}) and spaceId = #{spaceId}
